1.title: Land of Giants

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Steve showcases some of the largest deadly dinosaurs of all time.

2.title: Deadly Defenders

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Steve is on a quest to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders such as the armored Nodosaurus, the mighty Iguanodon and the rampaging Ankylosaurus.

3.title: King of the Killers

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Steve is on a quest to find the most dangerous dinosaur of all time such as the deadly T-rex, the axe-like Allosaurus, and the tank-like Spinosaurus.

4.title: Freak or Unique

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Steve looks for the weirdest dinosaur ever such as Gigantoraptor, which laid the biggest eggs of all time, the minuscule Magyarosaurus, and the biggest headbutter of them all that could take on Steve's giant dino robot.

5.title: Kings of the Sky

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Steve searches for the greatest terrors from the skies such as the bird-like Microraptor or the possibly largest flier ever - Hatzegopteryx.

6.title: Aquatic Terrors

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Steve searches for the greatest terrors from the deep such as the dolphin-like Ophthalmosaurus, the giant croc-like Sarcosuchus or the monstrous Pliosaurus (infamously also known as the Predator X).

7.title: Super Senses

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Steve looks for dinosaurs that had some special ability which would give them a killer edge over their competitors such as Troodon's night vision, Daspletosaurus' incredible sense of smell, or Spinosaurus' croc-like killer bite.

8.title: Secret Skills

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Steve is on a quest to find the sneakiest dinosaurs such as the possibly venomous Sinornithosaurus, the speedy Velociraptor or the stompy Argentinosaurus.

9.title: Deadlier Than the Dinosaurs

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Steve switches things up a bit by going after the deadliest things that threatened dinosaurs other than other dinos such as the killer monsoons, sandstorms, bacteria, poisonous gasses and, of course, asteroids.

10.title: Backshall's Ultimate Dinosaur

episode of.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Steve takes a look at some of his favorite crazy experiments and stunts from the show and wraps things up by combining the best killer traits from all the species he has covered on the show to build his ultimate deadly dinosaur.

imdb.title: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall
akas: Deadly Dinosaurs with Steve Backshall (United Kingdom)
plot: English naturalist Steve Backshall uses modern technology to test the incredible abilities of various dinosaurs. Each episode features several dinos that had something in common and Steve's adventurous tests of their skills.
